Package com.gemalto.mfs.mwsdk.dcm

Interface WalletPinEventListener

public interface WalletPinEventListener
An interface to delegate events while managing the wallet PIN use cases. See AbstractWalletPinService.

  • Method Summary

    Modifier and Type
    Method
    Description
    void
    onError(WalletPinErrorCode walletPinErrorCode, String message)
    An error occurred while performing an operation on wallet PIN management.
    void
    onPinChanged()
    A callback to indicate that a new wallet PIN has been changed.
    void
    onPinSet()
    A callback to indicate that a new wallet PIN has been set.
    void
    onPinVerified()
    A callback to indicate that the wallet PIN verification succeeds.

  • Method Details

    • onPinSet

      void onPinSet()
      A callback to indicate that a new wallet PIN has been set.

    • onPinVerified

      void onPinVerified()
      A callback to indicate that the wallet PIN verification succeeds.

    • onPinChanged

      void onPinChanged()
      A callback to indicate that a new wallet PIN has been changed.

    • onError

      void onError(WalletPinErrorCode walletPinErrorCode, String message)
      An error occurred while performing an operation on wallet PIN management.
      Parameters:
      walletPinErrorCode - The error codes attached to a certain use case.
      message - The error message.
